name: CatAttack Arcade
description:
Introduction

This is CatAttack, a game about being an evil, powerful cat willing to destroy all of your owners' belongings. Your power makes you hungry really fast, so you'll have to seek for food cans to fill your stomach. Be careful! Some cans are not exactly food!

Game Jam

This game is a submission for the Dream Arcade Archive Jam. My focus within this game jam was to create an arcade game that integrated an adaptation of modern "hunger" survival systems, plus some pop/internet(?) culture that wasn't present in the original arcade times, as is the videos of cats destroying stuff. All of these while trying to keep the arcade feeling alive.

Controls

They're very simple, punch and pick things up with "Z", move with arrows or WASD.

Credits

Most of the art in the game and the game itself is made by me.

Credits to other artists:

- Main Character

- Background Chiptune (Faster)

- Sound effects

Right now you can only play on browser. Thanks for playing! :)
